name: WRATH (itch) (Vincent TRINEL)
description:
WRATH is a Tactical-RPG in which you embody Koura, an ancient fallen god forgotten by his people who replaced him with other deities. Koura returns from ancient times to unleash his wrath on the people and annihilate the new gods.

In this game, you control only one character who uses sacred discs to defeat his enemies. The player can throw and recall discs around the character.  The trajectory depends on the skills equipped.

The player needs to equip himself with :

  • Throwing skill that determines the trajectories of throwing discs.
  • Recall skill that determines the trajectories of recalling discs.
  • Special skill that allows alternate movement.

Each disc also has unique properties, like the ability to explode or pass obstacles.

This is a prototype created as part of a student project developed in two weeks by a team of 12 people.

Controls :
  • Escape: Access pause menu
  • Right mouse click: Cancel selection
  • Left mouse click: Select skill/Confirm use of skill
  • Mouse over: Display tooltips
  • "A": Shortcut of movement
  • "Z": Shortcut to select the throwing skill
  • "E": Shortcut to select the recall skill
  • "R": Shortcut to select the special skill
  • "Enter": Shortcut to End Turn (Hold)

Note : You need to hold the "End Turn" button (or keypad shortcut) few seconds to confirm the action.
